title.narrative: Programme Activities and Fund Managment Fees in the areas of Stabilisation, State-Building and Conflict Mitigation to help create a more Stable and Secure Somalia.

description.narrative: This activity (Programme Activities and Fund Managment Fees in the areas of Stabilisation, State-Building and Conflict Mitigation to help create a more Stable and Secure Somalia.) is a component of Somalia Stability Fund II reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £25,592,319. This component benefits Somalia, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Human rights, Participation in international peacekeeping operations. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, Crown Agents Bank, Crown Agents Bank Limited – CHAPS, Crown Agents Limited. The start date is 01-09-2016 and the end date is 30-12-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
